title: All Ball - Pt. 1: NBA Champ Andrew Bogut on Australian Upbringing, Rick Majerus Experience, Being Drafted #1 Overall
itunes:title: All Ball - Pt. 1: NBA Champ Andrew Bogut on Australian Upbringing, Rick Majerus Experience, Being Drafted #1 Overall
description:
In this episode, Doug sits down for the first part of a two part conversation with NBA champion and former #1 overall pick Andrew Bogut. They discuss his path from a working class Australian childhood to becoming the college player of the year at Utah with Rick Majerus, and then the #1 overall pick in the 2005 NBA Draft. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts! Warning: Explicit Language

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
